sections.MISSION:
Comanche Troop executes M4 qualification from 23-26AUG21 at Ranges 122 and 123 IOT qualify soldiers on M4 and M249 weapons systems
C TRP M4/M249 Qual 23-26 AUG2021
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
–
Zero and qualify 10 D TRP Soldiers
Uniform: OCPs, ACH, IOTV, Eye Pro, Ear Pro, Gloves
5.
sections.CMD AND SIGNAL:
Signal
Primary: Troop CMD Net: FH 805
Alternate: HF
Contingency: Cell Phone
Emergency: Runner
OIC: 1LT Arghavani +49 162 482-8213
RSO: SFC Snyder +49 151 245-1490
Ammo NCOIC: SSG Harrington
Medic: SPC Mandujano
sections.PURPOSE: – Ensure Comanche Troop SMs are fundamentally sound on all levels on marksmanship IOT prepare for upcoming training events and maintain lethality within Comanche Troop.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Zero all M4 and M249s
Engage Targets with an M4/M249 Qualify all shooters on M4/M249 IAW TC 3-22.4
Correct Malfunctions of an M4/M249
Target Transitions/ Movement
Magazine Changes
3.
sections.EXECUTION:
All will draw their respective weapons systems at their Troops.
SMs will link-up at the Troop AO for transportation to Range 123.
SMs will SP to Range 123.
Range set- up tutorial, OIC & RSO brief
SMs will begin training once range is live and ammo has been dropped off.
SMs will conduct M4 qualification and M249 qualification at Range 123 IAW TC 3-22.40.
Personnel:
Ammo Allocation per qual
M4
Group and Zero: 45 Rounds
Qualification: 40 Rounds
Night Qualification (60 soldiers): 20 Rounds
M249
Group and Zero: 35 Rounds
Qualification: 200 Rounds
Night Qualification: 100 Rounds
Range 101
Range 102
4.
sections.SUSTAINMENT:
Class I – M/M/M
Class III – Refuel vehicles if needed
Class V – 5.56MM BALL TR 4/1 F/SAW – 7830 5.56MM BALL M855A1 - 13798
Class VIII – CLS bag / PLT

1st PLT: (a) Provide 2 Safeties
2nd PLT: (a) Provide 1 OIC and 1 RSO (b) Provide 1 Ammo NCO and 2 Ammo Soldiers
Provide 2 Gate Guards with radio
Provide 2 Safeties
